MO-0_schema_compliance.notes: Field names follow slides-render-schema conventions; decisions use title/description/status (pending).

MO-2_section_dividers_and_sections.notes: 6 section_divider slides present and top-level sections array has 6 entries; aligned.

MO-4_visual_placeholder_completeness.notes: All visuals with type != 'none' include placeholder_data (chart_config/mermaid_code/comparison_items).

MO-5_slide_type_component_alignment.notes: Slide types match the primary component type per alignment rules.

MO-6_no_data_fabrication.notes: All numerical values traceable to source document or marked qualitative.

MO-7_content_deduplication.notes: content[] does not duplicate component labels/titles; components are the single source of truth where applicable.

MO-8_title_and_section_restrictions.notes: Title slide has empty components; section_dividers contain at most one callout component.

MO-9_no_components_visual_duplication.notes: No identical data repeated in both components and visual.placeholder_data.

MO-10_comparison_items_richness.notes: All comparison_items include >=3 attributes when derived from multi-item lists.

MO-11_slide_completeness.notes: 30 slides present in semantic file matching source headings.

MO-12_cover_slide_title.notes: Cover title equals frontmatter title (duration suffix stripped).
